item.title: CVE-2021-21487|2024-08-03T18:16:22.474Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20payment%20engine
item.description: SAP Payment Engine version 500, does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.
